    • Method Detail

      • loadReceiptFile

        public File loadReceiptFile()
        Returns the File object for the receipt File. Attempts to load from the web if it does not exist on disk.

      • createReceiptFile

        public boolean createReceiptFile(File receipt)
        Sets the file of the receipt photo. Attempts to compress it to be less than 65536 and attempts to save it to the web.
        Parameters:
        receipt - The file object for the stored image.
        context -

      • getReceiptFile

        public File getReceiptFile()
        Just returns the File object for the receipt File.

      • setReceiptFile

        public void setReceiptFile(File receiptFile)
        Just sets the File object for the receipt File to the given file.

      • initNewPhoto

        public File initNewPhoto()
        Returns an initialized file to save a photo to.

      • removeReceiptFile

        public void removeReceiptFile()
        Removes the receipt photo from the expense, deletes the local file, and attempts to delete the photo from the web as well.

      • getUniquePhotoId

        public UUID getUniquePhotoId()
        Retrieves the unique identifier for the ReceiptPhoto

      • isPhotoSavedToWeb

        public boolean isPhotoSavedToWeb()
        Should Return true if this photo has been successfully saved to the web

      • setPhotoSavedToWeb

        public void setPhotoSavedToWeb(boolean state)
        Sets boolean state of PhotoSavedToWeb
